attr.title: Carpet Gallery
attr.inst: Download the Linux version of the game free from itch.io (https://ivysly.itch.io/carpetgallery), extract, and copy carpetgallery.pck to the port's folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the **Linux version** of the game free from [itch.io](https://ivysly.itch.io/carpetgallery), extract, and copy `carpetgallery.pck` to the port's folder.
